import re

def extract_keywords(course_description, learning_objectives, table_details):
    # Combine all text into a single string
    text = course_description + learning_objectives + table_details
    
    # Remove special characters and convert to lowercase
    text = re.sub(r'[^a-zA-Z0-9\s]', '', text).lower()
    
    # Split text into individual words
    words = text.split()
    
    # Remove stop words (common words like 'the', 'and', etc.)
    stop_words = ['the', 'and', 'a', 'an', 'is', 'in', 'it', 'of', 'to']
    words = [word for word in words if word not in stop_words]
